description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, defining colors, layout, and responsive design elements.

classes.name: app
classes.description: Main application container providing a flexible layout.

classes.name: card
classes.description: Styling for individual cards within the application, including padding and shadow.

classes.name: header
classes.description: Styling for the header section of the application, featuring a gradient background.

classes.name: title
classes.description: Styling for the title text within headers.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styling for status messages displaying the current game state.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Styling for the game board layout using CSS grid.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styling for each square in the Tic Tac Toe board, indicating the player's moves.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Styling for the control buttons used in the game.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: General styling for buttons within the application.

classes.name: scoreboard
classes.description: Styles for displaying the game score.

classes.name: score
classes.description: Styling for individual scores in the scoreboard.
